TestItem.Stem: According to paragraph 6, why might the puzzling questions about the paintings never be answered?

Distractor_list.Distractor: Keeping the paintings a mystery will increase their importance.
The artists hid their tools with great intelligence and skill.
Too many years have gone by since the images were painted.
Answering the questions is not very important to scholars.

TestItem.Glossary: holy people who act as healers and diviners
